reviews: We came here for our honeymoon and it was the most amazing experience! The resort is breathtakingly beautiful, and the atmosphere is so relaxing and peaceful! Our butlers, Gustavo and Roberto took such great care of us and drew up romantic bubble baths and had aromatherapy ready for us every night. Carlos and Omar supplied us with fresh cold water and plenty of towels on our beach cabana daily. The spa was so relaxing, especially our VIP romantic experience. Gerardo and Roger were our waiters on the beach for our romantic dinner and they had us laughing and smiling the whole time. And Thalia our concierge set up a whole itinerary and helped with every single want and need we had. The food here is absolutely amazing, the service is incredible, and we can’t wait to come back for

Very relaxing stay at Le Blanc for our baby moon! Service from all the staff has been wonderful, especially from the beach staff and our butler. Delicious food & drinks at all the restaurants, would highly recommend!

I would highly recommend Antonio our butler for his excellence in service, attentive, friendly, extremely helpful and last but not least Chef Heber an amazing chef treated us with the outmost respect and prepared an delightful seafood platter, my greatest wishes to you guys

Great place fr quiet, relaxation and  unwinding. Staff have been attentive, especially Jeanette & Carlos on the beach. Our room has been spotless by Ysenvia as well. Highly recommend the visiting the spa. We did the golden vip romantic package and it was phenomenal. Exquisite gym and fitness classes.

Every foods are so delicious, and facility is so perfect. I’m from to Korea, maybe I will recommend to my friends who plan to travel Cancun. Finally everything is easy to use for Korean because of concierge 제하, and then menu in Korean etc..
Amazing place. all the staffs are kind and atmosphere is very nice. Best resort for honeymoon! 한국인 컨시어지 제하분이 체크인 첫날부터 호텔 소개도 시켜주시고 한국어메뉴판도 있어서 음식도 잘 잘길 수 있었어요. 칸쿤에서 묶은 곳 중에서 가장 쾌적하고 음식이 맛있었숩니다! 강추!

We LOVE Le Blanc Cancun! We brought our best friends this year and we all stayed 7 days. The best food, best pools, best beach, best service! Having the butler service at Le Blanc is a real game changer. The entire staff was so personable, friendly and helpful!  We're Palace Residence members now, and we can help you with any questions or booking your next Palace vacation! You can find us as CircleHVacations on FB, IG or TikTok.  We would highly recommend Le Blanc Cancun, as well as all the other Palace Resort properties!

This resort was impeccable from the start to finish the service and food were amazing. BRITO was our waiter and he went ABOVE AND BEYOND for anything that was needed.  This is truly a high class facility and you will not find another hotel like this anywhere in the world. 5 star dining every meal we ate was delicious even the buffet.  Yama and the French resturant were our favourites  also we used the cabana service which was highly worth it.  If we are ever in Mexico again we will try the Cabo hotel as well.  Thank you for making our trip truly amazing

We had a trip with our adult kids to Le Blanc Cancun.  This is one of my favorite resorts and it was great to share with the family just how pampering and stunning the resort is. The staff to guest ratio is part of the wonderful and attentive resort  experience that is signature to Le Blanc.   Roberto and Joel, the doormen, are gracious, offer a cool towel and handle luggage to all guests at arrival. The lobby is stunning in the simplicity and its signature fragrance of mint & cucumber. Room amenities are Bvlgari Blanc.  Guests receive a carnation and warm neck pillow and a refreshing coconut tropical drink at check in. The bracelet with the room key built in is very convenient. Our concierges Roger and Ingrid handle our dinner and spa bookings. Each floor also has day/evening

The food was ok. Long wait times for room service and at the restaurants even with reservations.   There were issues with the hot water everyday around 11am-1pm where even on the cold settings it was scolding hot. The towels were rough.  The staff was overall friendly, the spa was nice!  I have visited both Le Blanc and the Los cabos locations is exceptionally better. I was looking to upgrade my membership but after the service we experienced here I’m not investing anything else into the Palace Elite franchise.

We loved our experience at Le Blanc Cancun! It was extremely relaxing. Our Butlers, Brito and Eduardo, took care of our every need and request. They are welcoming and attentive.  We will definitely be back!

An absolutely wonderful experience first class service Antonio and Heber both daytime and evening time Butler Did a wonderful job wouldn’t be the same without these guys first class customer service.  We were here all week tried every single restaurant every single one first class service me and my wife, a huge foodie people to nothing to complain about.   The only thing I would have negative feedback with is the push to sell timeshare but I understand businesses need to make money but it was a hard sell.

My husband and I traveled to Le Blanc to celebrate our 10 year anniversary. This was our first time staying at an all inclusive resort. Le Blanc did not disappoint.  Our butlers, Gustavo and Roberto made us feel welcome and went out of their way to make our anniversary trip feel special. The food was amazing. Highly recommend Bella and Yama. We were new to eating Sushi and Lorenzo made amazing recommendations and brought us lots of samples to try. It was more than just a meal, he created an experience. Tomas at Bella provided exceptional service to us twice. We were even greeted with roses on the table for our final meal of the trip. Although Lumiere was not our favorite food, Carlos provided fantastic service with detailed descriptions of the food and how it was prepared. The

Everything, I mean everything, is done at the highest level. If you haven't been to le Blanc be prepared to be amazed. The staff, the restaurants, the bars, the beach, the pools, etc all make for a most enjoyable stay. We had some fun times at the lobby bar with Ivan (made us some special and unique drinks), Romam and the rest of the bar staff. Our butlers Marco and Joel were very helpful and exceeded expectations. Of note was our breakfast server at Blanc Fernando who was particularly attentive.

Wow, just wow!  My husband and I have been to Moon Palace resorts 10-15 times, but this was our first visit to Le Blanc and we were beyond impressed.  Moon Palace has always been so incredible, but Le Blanc is on another level of pampering.  There wasn't a single bad experience we encountered.  From the lovely Nadia who greeted us, our amazing server at the pool, Jeanette (she is truly amazing!), our butlers Hugo and Ramiro who were always willing to help with whatever we needed, and Axel who did an absolute exceptional job cleaning our room each day.  There are so, so many other people who treated us so kindly all week that I can't list them all. The restaurants are so incredible, I just can't say enough.  While all were amazing, our favorite was Lumiere.  We ate there twice

We stayed at Le Blanc Cancun for a girls trip a few weeks ago and had a lovely time.  It was the best all-inclusive experience I’ve ever had!  Beautiful property, great food and drinks, super-friendly, professional staff, and next level service.   Our butlers Santiago and Manuel were the absolute best!  They made sure we were well taken care of day and night and seemed to anticipate our every need.  Their attention and execution made the stay even more enjoyable.     There was a great vibe at the main pool with surprises and delights at any given time (fun games, churro cart, sangria cart, ice cream stand, hand-delivered treats, mimosa bar, occasional music). Ivan at the swim-up bar was a blast and his cocktail creations were yummy. And the service at the pool was on point.  We

Brito was outstanding. Excellent time. Would highly recommend. Everyone has an excellent personal touch and genuinely cares that you're taken care of.   You'll find yourself spending most of the day in the beautiful infinity pool with excellent views of the ocean.

Jeanette was awesome!! Loved the beach at le Blanc. So relaxing after a hectic year. The pool is super cool and has the best view in the palace resorts. Not crowded. You must stay for the fish market on Wednesdays. Such good food.

The service was great and the people were the nicest. Amazing service and super fun for me and everyone that I was with, property was super relaxing and people were amazing!! Jeanette was also super amazing and was super helpful

Awesome service, awesome drinks, great people. Pools and spaces are top tier. Janet delivered especially great service on the beach and was very attentive. The water was very warm and clear. Buffet and food was amazing.

Hola!  We’re  back home from another week in Paradise. Once again Our friends at le Blanc exceeded our expectations. The people at le Blanc are what make it special. There’s too many to call out but here’s a few. Laura and Lucinda, our Pool concierge’s, are the sweetest, hardest working and most helpful hosts you’ll find anywhere. Servers are all great, Erick & Manuel at Blank and Lorenzo at Yama are a few of the awesome ones. The Yama restaurant was so good we asked our Butler (Gustavo) to book us  a second dinner there. Gustavo mentioned he was friends with the Head Chef at Yama and would let him know how much we liked it. When we got to Yama we were told by our waiter, Lorenzo, that the Chef instructed him to tell us to order what we wanted but he was making something special

Beautiful resort! Great spa, very relaxing. Fedel at Le Muir is Amazing! Not to mention the delicious red snapper at terreza. Everything about this resort is amazing. You won’t regret your stay here at the Le Blanc.

Fidel did a great job a limiere. He has a contagious smile and a very inviting service. Including rafele. The food was great. He served us as royalty and made us feel very welcome to the premises which created a very inviting environment.

My wife and I came to Le Blanc for the first time after coming to Cancun twice a year for the last ten years. We had the best time! The service was exceptional, the food top quality in both presentation and flavor, drinks were great, and all the staff was kind and welcoming. The hotel was clean, beautiful, and had everything you need. The gym has all state of the art equipment, Pilates classes, trx, spin we really enjoyed it. The spa was also fabulous with the hydrotherapy!!  The rooms and butler service was phenomenal and I felt like a queen!  My favorite was that the second you enter the resort you receive a cold towel, a welcome drink and a flower :)  Thank you to the bar staff- Alex, Jorge, Marcus, the restaurant staff Fidel, Cesar, Roberto,Christian,ChriS- pool food.  The

We went to celebrate our anniversary from the vip pickup checkin was a breeze Restaurants were all excellent service and food our fav Italian and French. Dinner on the beach was excellent fun experience  Also did cabana on the beach was excellent service Jesus and Esteban and the champagne was perfect touch VIP couples massage was awesome also

We had a great week on our 2nd visit to this resort.  Our first stay was 8 years ago, May 2014.  I think I enjoyed our stay even more this time.  We’ve previously been to many Palace resorts, including 3 visits to Le Blanc Cabo location in the last 4 years.  While overall we like the layout of the rooms better at Cabo, this property was still very comfortable and I think we both agreed the service at the Cancun property might have been slight notch higher than our last visit to Cabo.  We traveled with our member friends and had another wonderful trip.  This trip we decided to fly in on Friday night before our stay, stay in a lower-cost hotel (Residence Inn) for that first night and check in early to the resort on day of arrival – Saturday.  We would do this again!  When you

We stayed at Leblanc Cancun to celebrate our anniversary and had a great time. At first, I was a little disappointed that my room had some humidity but after expressing my concern management really went out of their way to correct the situation, and even upgraded us the last couple of nights to the presidential suite. The food at this resort is second to none even better than non-all inclusive resorts, which we have been to in the Caribbean in the past. The staff is very attentive and provide great service. The resort is clean and modern. We had such a great time that we are thinking of going back even before the one-year mark of our first visit. Thank you Leblanc for caring about your guests.

Vacationing at Le Blanc in Cancun was an amazing experience!! Such a high quality of service from the staff including the Butlers-Eduardo and Brito!! I highly recommend this resort and look forward to going back!!

¿Where to begin to describe this fantastic Resort? Le Blanc was the best place we could choose for our honeymoon. The attention and the food are extraordinary.  Our experience was magical and unique. Definitely exceeded our expectations. The Walk On suite, elegant, sober, cozy, with incredible views of the sunrise. The attention and service of our waitress Patricia, simply excellent. The service of Manuel and Santiago our Concierge was exceptional, excellent, thank you for organizing the amenities, reservations and clear and timely information. A special thanks to the Chef Heber Gonzalez & your team, surprised us with delicious delicacies at the Terraza and Yama restaurants, his attention and special dishes were a plus that made this experience unforgettable, likewise we thank

Best international vacation so far! Our butlers Santiago and Manuel went above and beyond daily to make sure our stay was as nice and relaxing as possible. Santiago made sure we had all excursions booked and followed up often to make sure there was no confusion or problems along the way. Manuel made every night the most relaxing experience with quick service and friendly familiarity. Can’t wait to book again?

What a great vacation spot! Amazing pools, drinks, restaurants, room amenities, live entertainment, beach walks, and all topped off the with the most kind and good-hearted people taking care of you.  We thoroughly enjoyed Bella, Yama, and Lumiere restaurants but our server Alberto @Yama really made it amazing for us one night by having the chef cook a special meal for us which was unexpected. They treated us to one of the best meals we've ever had anywhere - thanks for that wonderful time! They even had a very unique dessert planned. These are the kind of things that bring you back in the future when you are deciding to possibly go somewhere else. Thanks to everyone at Le Blanc for the great getaway!

Our stay was outstanding from start to finish.   My husband and i and our two daughters (24 and 21) were staying at an all inclusive for the first time ever.  LeBlanc set the bar incredibly high!    Our butlers, Roberto and Gustavo, were incredibly helpful, and the epitome of customer service.  It is always so wonderful to start the day with a smile from them and a question of “What can we do to help today?”  Our pool experience was also excellent.  Marcos at the bar and Rafael and Marine anticipated our needs and were so friendly.  We loved our time at the beautiful pool and pool area.  Every night before dinner we stopped at the bar and Mayra was the best.  Service with a smile and questions about our day- we lived that routine of drinks before dinner and she made it even

There’s a reason or two why they are number 1!  We are four days into our ten day stay, and are very happy. Everyone here is pleasant, friendly and willing to go out of their way to make your experience fabulous!   Jesus at the lunar pool is friendly, & efficient.  He is more than willing to answer questions and help with anything he can! Carlos at Terraza is beyond!  He recognizes us and has things prepared just for us! Wow! Victor at the Buffet was wonderful. Emmanuel at the concierge helped us out with changing some reservations.  He worked his magic! The French is a must do- our main waiter Cesar was beyond. He knew the menu and explained everything to us perfectly. They work as a team there and we were very impressed. The head waiter, Carlos, seated us early to help us out!

Best hotel, food and staff! We make sure to go every year because it feels like a second home. From Isiah at the door to Raphael, Isidro, cristian, esteban and Javier on the beach, you always feel welcome and taken care of. Roger is an excellent Diamond concierge! I wish I could name everyone who made our stay awesome. There isn’t one staff member who doesn’t go above and beyond. We love le Blanc.

Stay at le blanc was a dream. The staff were ALL amazing, especially our butler. They accommodated and more to our expectations. The food, drinks, and entertainments were all amazing. I will definitely  be coming back.

June 2023 Fidel does a great job at making a super inviting environment for customers at lumiere which not only creates an inviting environment to eat in but makes the experience so much enjoyable. Javier also can’t go unnoticed because he also does the same. Luis at Terraza was incredible, he created a fabulous dinner experience for us, definitely exceeded our expectation.

I will start this review by saying that my wife and I were there in March loved it a lot and went back in June. Every time we are at Le Blanc we experience a wonderful time and that is only achieved by how hard the staff of the hotel works to make your stay the best ever.   * I will say the restaurants are very good but I do wish that they would feature their Mexican restaurant  inside. It is very hard to enjoy a nice dinner when it’s so hot and humid outside. I would love to see the Mexican restaurant share space with their steakhouse, perhaps even alternating evenings. I wanted to enjoy it more, but it was very difficult due to the weather but their staff is amazing starting with Edgar, Yesenia, Rafael, chef Adrian are amazing and try very hard to give you a great experience.

grreeeeeeaaattttt experiences!  it was great choice for us to choose le blanc as our honeymoon! it was little windy and hot considering the season that we have visited! but everyting else was perfect  all little tips that Jeha gave us during our stay helped us ×2 to enjoy cancun and the hotel!!  everyone was so kind to us, the spa was perfect. all of the restaurants were great!! (personally, the mexican was the best :)  hope to revisit!!!  will never forget those turtles on the beach, hope ro come back when there are baby turtles grreeeeeeaaattttt experiences!  it was great choice for us to choose le blanc as our honeymoon! it was little windy and hot considering the season that we have visited! but everyting else was perfect  all little tips that Jeha gave us during our stay

The people and service is what makes this resort so great! I absolutely love the hydrotherapy run at the spa. It is unique and relaxing. Every one greets us by name and makes the experience very personal. The hostess Delilia greeted us each morning at the Blanc by name after only giving her my name once. Orlando the spa butler made each day at the spa impressive and relaxing for me, and my wife's attendant Anna was as equally impressive according to my wife. It is all the little things that make this place shine. Gustavo our room butler was amazing. He greeted us every time we walked by him. He made it a point to make us feel welcome and to assist us with any needs that may have arisen. The service anywhere on property is first class. The pools have enough staff so you are not

This resort was the most relaxing resort I’ve been to. I’ve been to a couple in Cancun. As this was by far the most calm and peaceful. There weren’t as many activities throughout the day or night, but that’s what we wanted for our honeymoon. We just wanted to spend time with each other. If you’re looking for a crazy, party resort…this is not your place. This is a beautiful, calming resort. The staff was what made our trip incredible. Jesus, Rafael, and Jose at the pool were so much fun everyday. Erik at breakfast and lunch knew our drink order everyday. Ricardo, victor, and Edgar at dinner treated us so well that we requested them multiple times to eat dinner with them. Everyone treated us like royalty. Even Ana at the spa was so sweet.
Excellent service, drinks and food! Make reservations for this great restaurant.  Alberto was our server and was so great with recommendations. Try the Bao buns, sweet and sour chicken, and momoten!

So many wonderful things to say about this hotel. The restaurants and service were out of this world. Shout out to Christian and Alberto at Yama. Amazing atmosphere, impeccable service. We had high expectations for our stay here and they were still exceeded. Just make sure not to go to the “presentation”

Amazing stay.  The resort is gorgeous and clean.    Food is great and the service is outstanding.  Everything we asked for was taken care of, no one ever says "no" to a request.    Our butlers Joel, Bristo, and Edmund were not only so nice, they are on top of any request you have like changing dinner times or bringing things to the room.    At the pool Laura and Lucinda went above and beyond making us comfortable, and Christi made sure we were never hungry!

Le Blanc has firmly established itself as my resort of choice following our recent unforgettable journey. The exceptional experience offered by this establishment left us both spellbound and immensely satisfied. We were particularly impressed by the culinary delights served at all the restaurants, with Lumiere, the French eatery, and Terraza, specializing in Mexican cuisine, standing out significantly. Lumiere managed to captivate our taste buds with their exquisite chocolate soufflé, and the stellar service added a feather to their already illustrious cap. Terraza, on the other hand, amazed us with their chef's off-the-menu specials, providing a pleasant surprise to our gastronomical adventure.   The resort's butler service deserves special praise as well. Our heartfelt

It is extremely hard to capture all the wonderful experiences at LeBlanc Cancun. From the moment you arrive, you are welcomed by the smell of cucumber aroma in the lobby and a warm neck wrap. Every single person on staff is kind and welcoming.  We spent out days by the pool with an amazing pool staff that was so accommodating. Each afternoon Laura would come by with cucumbers and a washcloth for your eyes and provide a massage treatment. Laura is amazing!  Then you have people like Alexander at the third floor pool who goes above and beyond. Alexander was always there with a smile and even made a special run to get my wife her favorite salad. Edgar was another mvp, always checking to make sure we had the right drinks. Isidra was another person who constantly checked in to make

Went on honeymoon in June 2023. This was probably our 10th trip to this Resort. The main thing is, the staff are very attentive and Seem to always be looking for ways to make your trip better. Management seems to go out Of their way to evaluate staff and look for how they can better care for your needs.  We have been to other all inclusive resorts that are less expensive. But you get what you pay for.   From the front desk where we checked in with Cynthia  to our butlers,  Saul and Jose everyone looks to make your trip a wonderful experience.   One of the reasons that I come back every year is for the experience in the mens spa. Pablo and Miguel take very good care of me. The steam, sauna and hydrotherapy allow me to relax and rewind  if you enjoy massage therapy the staff is

Amazing service and amenities all around. Our Butlers Antonio, Herber did a great job our first night making us feel welcome. Once we upgraded to another room, Saul & Raul provided us with exceptional service. Fernando at reception desk was very helpful. Pool staff & their services were great also! Good food, especially Yama! We ended our stay watching a turtle lay eggs along side the hotel’s conservation team member. Looking forward to another visit.

The service is a 10/10 over all of the other luxury all inclusives that we have been to in Mexico.   Hugo, Ramiro, and Miguel were all amazing while on our trip. Couldn’t be happier.   Very restful, the hydrotherapy spa is included and is amazing.   The staff and the service is off the charts. The food is super top notch.   Also their top shelf alcohol choices for hard alcohol are excellent.   This is a true 5 Star resort.

My husband and I have traveled a lot and nowhere compares to the pampering we received at LeBlanc. Everyone has butler service and you constantly feel like a VIP guest. The spa is out of this world and hydrotherapy is fabulous. It is included in your stay, so do it every day if you can. Unlike most all inclusive resorts, the food is delicious. The only thing I regret is not staying longer. A big shout out to Hugo, Ramiro, Miguel, and Roger for making our stay extra special. We can't wait to come back.

My husband and I spent a week here for our honeymoon and had the most amazing time. Le Blanc is unlike any other resort we have stayed at. The staff and overall service is outstanding and our personal butlers, Eduardo and Brito were phenomenal and truly enhanced our stay. We asked for a bottle of champagne sent to our room one night after dinner and they went above and beyond by filling up our jacuzzi with bubbles, laid out rose petals, and delivered chocolate covered strawberries and ice cold champagne. Anything you can dream of, you can get here! We also enjoyed all the delicious restaurants, amazing poolside cocktails served by the most hardworking staff, and all the fun entertainment and activities they hosted. PS: you have to try the fresh churros from the poolside churro
